.
.
.

I was late last night coming home on the bike and decided to try out the other side of the river rather than going through Battersea park. Stopped to take a quick photo of Albert Bridge.
.
.
.
#visitlondon #timeoutlondon #theprettycities #shotbypixel #teampixel #nofilter

I cycle past Albert Bridge on my new Thames path route back from the office. Before took long Putney bridge too will be a luminous landmark #priorities #tories 
Since the start of the year I've been posting a photo once a day. I'd been cheating though by going on holiday and building up a cache of images for posting later. Last month I decided to change to taking and posting photos on the same day - while sticking to the daily schedule. Today, December 1st is the first day of the new routine.
·
·
·

#lightbulb #architecture #interior #nofilter #shotonmoment #shotonpixel
Thames #river

I made a tool to stack images from my phone using Hyper.sh over the weekend. It takes a video, converts it to frames, aligns the frames to avoid shake/drift and averages them to create an interesting smoothing effect.

This photo was based on a short video clip I took while running to work.

Previously I needed to use Photoshop to make these images up - I've made that accessible from my phone; in the spirit of mobile photography and the best camera is the one you have with you etc etc.

I also wrote a blog post about this...
.
.
.
#imagestack #thames #river #church #houseboat #water #blur #city #teampixel #shotonpixel #nofilter #citylife #nofilterneeded #building #bridge #riverthames #buildings #cityscape #boat #town #riverside #waves #architecturelovers #reflection #londoncity

Wanted to take a picture of the inside of Christ Church again today but this is St Mary's Church Battersea instead. Christ Church is closed until the 8th.
